explains: adv. （引出第二种选择或可能的建议）要不，或者

sentences.en: You could, alternatively, hang onto it in the hope that it will be worth millions in 10 years time.
sentences.cn: 或者，你也可以把它留着，指望它10年后值好几百万。

sentences.en: Hotels are generally of a good standard and not too expensive. Alternatively you could stay in an apartment.
sentences.cn: 旅馆一般标准高并且不太贵。或者你可以住公寓。
或者，学生可以学习化学。
